categori ib (wilder area) view sahal arm locat whatcom, skagit, chelan counties, washington, usa nearest&#160;c mount vernon, washington coordin 48°49′58″n 121°20′51″w﻿ / ﻿48.83278°n 121.34750°w﻿ / 48.83278; -121.34750coordinates: 48°49′58″n 121°20′51″w﻿ / ﻿48.83278°n 121.34750°w﻿ / 48.83278; -121.34750[1] area 504,781 acr (204,278&#160;ha)[2] establish octob 2, 1968 visitor 21,623 (in&#160;2013)[3] governing&#160;bodi nation park servic north cascad nation park u.s. nation park locat state washington. park largest three nation park servic unit compris north cascad nation park servic complex. sever nation wilder area british columbia parkland adjoin nation park. park featur rug mountain peak protect portion north cascad range. content 1 human histori 1.1 paleoindian nativ american 1.2 modern explor 1.3 mining, log dam construct 1.4 establish nation park 2 park manag 3 geographi 3.1 north cascad geolog 3.2 mountain 3.3 water featur 3.4 glacier 4 ecolog 4.1 flora 4.2 fauna 4.3 fire 4.4 climat 4.5 air water qualiti 5 recreat 5.1 mountain 5.2 camp hike 6 tourism 6.1 attract 6.2 access 7 see also 8 refer 9 extern link human history[edit] paleoindian nativ americans[edit] human histori region part north cascad nation park date back end last glacial period, region continu inhabit least last 8-10,000&#160;years.[4] time, nativ american ancestor skagit tribe slowli advanc puget sound interior mountain region glacial ice retreated. archeolog evid continu human presenc north cascad date 4,470&#160;b.p. rock procur sourc region use manufactur stone tool weapon sever millennia.[4] hozomeen chert, type rock well-suit fabric implements, mine near hozomeen mountain, east park border, last 8,400&#160;years. hozomeen chert part archeolog record throughout skagit river valley, west park region east, indic peopl visit region purpos obtain raw materials.[5][6] prehistor micro blade date back 9,600&#160;year present discov cascad pass, mountain pass connect western lowland interior region park stehekin river valley. micro blade part archeolog assemblag includ five distinct cultur periods, indic peopl travel mountain nearli 10,000&#160;year ago.[7] archeolog excav cascad pass one 260 prehistor site identifi park.[8] microflak excav cascad pass; two right craft quartz.[7] white explor first enter area late 18th century, perhap 1,000 skagit live there.[9] skagit live settlements, cull need waterway travel way canoe. skagit form loos confeder tribe unit threaten outsid tribe haidas, live north.[9] erect larg hous lodg might hous multipl families, partion area entrance. lodg 100 feet (30&#160;m) length 20 40&#160;ft (6.1 12.2&#160;m) width roof shed-styles, single-pitch; structur built puget sound tribe usual gabl roof one-pitch.[9] skagit gener lowlanders, ventur north cascad summer months, structur mountain modest, consist mostli temporari build erect pole cover branches.[9] skagit erect totem pole particip potlatch ceremonies, similar haidas, less complex extravagance. 1910, 56 skagit remain region, number sinc rebound some.[9] nlaka'pamux 1914 inland resid north east skagits, nlaka'pamux (or thompson indian name explor david thompson), chelan, okanogan wenatchi tribe live partli year-round eastern section north cascades.[9] skagit thompson often disputes, raid other' camp search slave exact retributions. like coastal base skagits, inland tribe also construct long lodg occupi numer families, though style construct slightli differ lodg partit separ one famili another, frame construct cover reed mat rather cedar planking.[9] one wenatchi lodg describ thompson 240&#160;ft (73&#160;m) long.[9] inland tribe like travel foot horseback cano sinc inland region less dens forested. inland tribe also less bounti fisheri greater weather extrem due away moder influenc pacif ocean. additionally, inland tribe rare erect totem pole particip potlatch ceremonies. begin 20th century, inland tribes, like coastal neighbors, much reduc popul first encount white explor hundr year earlier, mostli due smallpox diseases.[9] modern exploration[edit] earliest white explor enter north cascad like scotsman name alexand ross 1811, employ pacif fur company, american-own company. southeast modern park boundary, ross member compani construct fort okanogan 1811, base oper earli period pacif northwest fur trade.[10] fort okanogon first american settlement present-day washington, well north rout follow member lewi clark expedit 1804-1806, also north fort vancouv columbia river.[11] fort okanogon later own north west compani hudson' bay company, british-owned.[11] much trade fur conduct nativ american white trapper trade post staf repres fur trade company. one season alone, ross trade 1500 beaver pelts.[10] 1814, ross becam first known white explor cross major peak north cascades, less interest explor simpli attempt discov rout would easili connect fur post interior washington puget sound west.[10][11] ross accompani three indians, one guide, led parti high pass north cascades. ross guid may travel far west skagit river, fail get puget sound.[11] fur trade slow consider demand fur decreas 1840 resid continu least augment incom trap fur futur park 1968 park established, render activ illegal.[10] asid isol trappers, north cascad saw explor 1850s. 1853, u.s. armi captain georg b. mcclellan led parti explor potenti place railroad could built region; mcclellan determin mountain numer precipit railway would construct well south current park.[12] american british disput region center fur trade treati 1818 allow joint administr oregon country, refer u.s. - british empir refer region columbia district.[13] treati set intern boundari 49th parallel, clear west rocki mountains, sinc rival fur trade outfit idea boundari be. oregon boundari disput britain u.s. eventu led oregon treati 1846, 49th parallel form current intern boundari well northern border current park.[13] late 1850s, member u.s. north west boundari commiss explor boundari region, attempt identifi mountains, river lake belong country.[13] one parti commiss led explor henri custer, explor much northern district park, publish report 1860s. custer' parti cross whatcom pass 1858 first white see challeng glacier hozomeen mountain.[13] impress scenic grandeur region, custer succinctli stated, "must seen, cannot described".[14] explor custer, gold discov quartz vein slope eldorado peak.[15] 1882, u.s. armi lt. henri hubbard pierc led govern sponsor explor travers along western boundari southern section current park, search transport rout natur resources. true parti led mcclellan 1850s, pierc fail find suitabl rout railway, margin suitabl rout roads. expedit militari 1883 1887 also determin mountain virtual impenetrable.[12] explor continu seek rout wagon road railway end 19th centuri much park explored, 1972 north cascad highway final bisect mountains.[12] mining, log dam construction[edit] prospector enter north cascad 1850s; placer mine first start along bank skagit river. 1870s, placer mine also commenc along rubi creek hundr miner flock region even though difficult access. mine activ along rubi creek end 1880 soon replac hard rock mine silver minerals.[10] second period mine last 1890 1940s, margin lucrative.[16] miner hamper short work seasons, difficult terrain, low quantiti ore lack financi investments.[17] miner built mani first trail road portion backcountry, involv intric engineering, includ bridg numer stream dynamit rock ledg steep gorg trail construction.[10][18] one mine compani built seri flumes, longest 3 mile (4.8&#160;km), transport lumber suppli water use hydraul mine operation.[10] latter year 19th centuri first half 20th century, larger scale mine compani mine silver lead addit gold, mostli littl profitability. demand variou metal constant, price tend fluctuat much mine viable.[10] region becam nation park, privat own mine inhold remained. one inholding, thunder creek mine, still privat own 1997.[19] unlik mani region pacif northwest, log littl major impact futur park.[20] rugged terrain exist econom viabl timber resourc closer transport routes, larg dissuad timber industri log area. 1897 washington forest reserv set aside, essenti preserv forestland would later becom park. 1905, manag reserv transfer u.s. depart interior u.s. depart agricultur u.s. forest servic subsequ creat administ forest reserv nationwide, redesign nation forests.[10] though depart agricultur allow commerci enterpris right log forest permit, timber taken region use local construct cabin similar small scale enterprises. log expand skagit river hydroelectr project commenc public util seattl citi light 1920s.[18] almost 12,000 acr (4,900&#160;ha) timber would left underwat complet ross dam. contract extract timber award 1945 project complet 1958.[10] none dam area extens log within current boundari nation park, adjoin ross lake nation recreat area. establish nation park[edit] establish yellowston nation park 1872 yosemit nation park 1890, led preservationist argu similar protect area u.s. even north cascad region provid protect design forest reserv 1897, activist argu region afford greater protect accord nation park designation.[21] petit submit 1892 washington state citizen establish nation park north lake chelan, mani visit region believ scenery, "greater switzerland's".[22] effort surfac 1906 year 1916 1921, sever bill design region nation park fail get ratif u.s. congress.[22] local support idea nation park, felt design would neg impact econom situation. u.s. forest servic also favor park would mean would relinquish control land, event uncommon sinc mani park establish origin manag forest service. effort appeas detractors, u.s. forest servic design primit area would provid increas protect pristin region managed.[22] mid-1930s, forest bob marshal argu region set asid wilderness, would keep nation park servic sinc mandat would forc construct road build "improvements" sake tourism. rival interest continu argu whether land remain manag u.s. forest servic nation park servic 1960s, environmentalist argument advoc nation park prevailed.[22] though north cascad nation park act design region nation park octob 2, 1968, nation park servic commenc direct manag januari 1, 1969.[23] north cascad nation park act also design ross lake lake chelan nation recreat areas. redwood nation park california also sign exist day north cascades.[22] 1988, much bob marshall' origin plan set asid futur park wilder achiev 93&#160;percent north cascad nation park design stephen mather wilderness.[24] park management[edit] mount triumph north cascad nation park manag nation park servic park headquart sedro-woolley, washington. park consist northern southern district unit. separ ross lake nation recreat area. southeast boundari southern district abut lake chelan nation recreat area; park two recreat area manag north cascad nation park complex.[25] three entiti establish 1968 1988, much park complex design wilder stephen mather wilderness, prevent non-natur alter 93&#160;percent park.[24][26] mandat nation park servic "...&#160;preserv protect natur cultur resources". organ act august 25, 1916, establish nation park servic feder agency. one major section act often summar "mission", "...&#160;to promot regul use the&#160;... nation parks&#160;... purpos conserv sceneri natur histor object wild life therein provid enjoy manner mean leav unimpair enjoy futur generations."[27] keep mandate, hunt illeg park, mining, log remov natur cultur resources. additionally, oil ga explor extract permitted. 2013, north cascad nation park record 21,000 visitors, adjoin ross lake nation recreat area report 725,000 visitor lake chelan nation recreat area 40,000 visitors.[3] peak visit month june september.[26] vast major visitor come ross lake nation recreat area easili access washington state rout 20, also known north cascad highway, road bisect park complex. north cascad nation park complex oper base budget $7,700,000 fiscal year 2010, augment anoth $3,700,000 non-bas fund fluctuat significantli year year, addit fund revenu gener concessionair contract user fees. much budget staffing, 83&#160;percent direct pay employ 81 perman employees, employ year-round, nearli 250 season term employe work primarili summer months.[26] north cascad nation park complex manag activ includ facil management, overse mainten construct roads, 396 mile (637&#160;km) trail 260 buildings, resourc management, involv area divers fire management, biolog resourc manag glacier monitoring. park employe also provid law enforcement, search rescue, medic response, interpret servic educ outreach, administr divis overse budgets, personnel contract services.[26] geography[edit] map north cascad nation park complex main article: geographi north cascad north cascad nation park locat portion whatcom, skagit, chelan counti u.s. state washington. bisect ross lake nation recreat area, park consist two districts; northern southern. northern boundari north district also intern border u.s. canada; latter manag adjoin skagit valley provinci park. entir eastern southern boundari north district border ross lake nra. western side north district border mount baker-snoqualmi nation forest within lie mount baker noisy-diobsud wildernesses, border park.[28][29][30] mount baker-snoqualmi nation forest also border portion southern district north cascad nation park, southwest. also along southwest border lie wenatche nation forest, within lie glacier peak wilderness.[28][31] southern boundari park share lake chelan nra, small section eastern boundari share okanogan nation forest.[28] lake chelan-sawtooth wilder lie wenatche okanogan nation forest along southeastern park boundary.[32] north cascad nation park nearli 9,000 feet (2,700&#160;m) vertic relief, park high point atop good mountain western valley situat around 400&#160;ft (120&#160;m) mean sea level, park highli vari ecosystem, includ eight life zones.[33][34] eros water glacial ice made mountain peak north cascad steepest mountain rang contigu u.s., rise 4,000 6,000&#160;ft (1,200 1,800&#160;m) bases.[35] north cascad nation park home 300 glacier well 300 lake headwat skagit, stehekin nooksack rivers.[34][36] rugged terrain obstacl urban consequently, north cascad nation park almost entir wilder though 120 mile (190&#160;km) seattle-tacoma intern airport seattle, washington.[37] north cascad geology[edit] name mountain peak central featur region, north cascad subsect cascad rang extend northern california british columbia, canada. north cascad northern section cascad rang unlik southern counterparts, consist mostli tertiari holocen volcan rocks, north cascad compos primarili mesozo crystallin metamorph rocks.[38] expos rock found north cascad nation park predat middl devonian approxim 400&#160;million year old.[39] much harder durabl newer volcan rock southern cascades, north cascad consequ rugged, steep terrain norm due heavi eros water ice.[40] appar still rising, north cascad origin form jumbl mass variou rock structur origin point thousand mile south 90&#160;million year ago. 40&#160;million year ago, heavier basalt rock ocean floor start push lighter granit rock core park' mountain upward, process ongoing.[41] continu rise conjunct eros water ice creat deep valley consequently, vertic relief significant, averag 4,000 6,000&#160;ft (1,200 1,800&#160;m), compar much taller mountain ranges.[40] mountains[edit] mount terror (left skyline), inspir peak (center) mcmillan spire (right center) south peak found picket rang tallest mountain north cascad nation park good mountain 9,220&#160;ft (2,810&#160;m).[42] good mountain remot backcountri region southern section park.[43] near good mountain sever peak exceed 9,000&#160;ft (2,700&#160;m) includ buckner mountain (9,114&#160;ft (2,778&#160;m))[44] mount logan (9,087&#160;ft (2,770&#160;m)).[45] 9000 feet, 5 mile (8.0&#160;km) northeast good mountain, black peak (8,970&#160;ft (2,730&#160;m)). promin peak southern section park includ boston peak (8,894&#160;ft (2,711&#160;m)),[46] eldorado peak (8,868&#160;ft (2,703&#160;m))[47] forbidden peak (8,815&#160;ft (2,687&#160;m)).[48] northern region park contain picket range, subrang skagit range, turn subrang north cascades.[49] picket rang numer spire omin name mount fury, mount challenger, poltergeist pinnacle, mount terror, ghost peak phantom peak, exceed 8,000&#160;ft (2,400&#160;m). picket rang 6&#160;mi (9.7&#160;km) long yet contain 21 peak 7,500&#160;ft (2,300&#160;m).[49] north picket rang near border canada lie mount redoubt (8,969&#160;ft (2,734&#160;m)), mount spickard (8,979&#160;ft (2,737&#160;m)) spire mox peak (8,630&#160;ft (2,630&#160;m)).[50] isol domin northwestern reach park lie oft photograph mount shuksan (9,131&#160;ft (2,783&#160;m)), tower 8,400&#160;ft (2,600&#160;m) baker lake 6&#160;mi (9.7&#160;km) south.[51] water features[edit] 500 lake pond locat within north cascad nation park complex.[52] glaciers[edit] aerial photograph neve glacier 1970 approxim 312 glaciers, north cascad nation park glacier u.s. park outsid alaska third glacier lower 48 state locat park.[53] count glacier adjoin nation recreat areas, north cascad nation park complex glacier cover expans total 27,000 acr (110&#160;km2) 2009.[54] dens concentr rel eas access north cascad glacier brought earliest scientif seri studi regard glaciolog u.s. begin 1955, univers washington sponsor richard c. hubley undertak annual aerial photographi expedit design captur imag glacier show alter might occurring.[55] 1960, austin post expand aerial coverag includ region also use ground base imageri augment research. 1971, base photograph imageri data collect sinc 1955, post other wrote groundbreak report document number scale glacier north cascades.[39] time austin post' inventory, studi conclud north cascad glacier experienc period minor growth equilibrium mid-20th century, undergo decad retreat. studi conclud annual glacial melt due season variat signific influenc river levels, account 30&#160;percent late summer water flow, directli impact support ecosystem salmon fisheries.[39] lower curti glacier 2003 compar 1985 extent demarc red line demonstr retreat glacier. nation park servic (nps), unit state geolog survey (usgs) privat research mauri s. pelto, led north cascad glacier climat project sinc 1984, continu research north cascad glaciers.[56] sinc 1993, np conduct rigor studi four park glaciers: noisi creek, silver, north klawatti sandale glaciers.[57] np research indic four glacier experienc rapid decreas volum 1993 2011.[58] 1998, np portland state univers aerial photograph inventori show 13&#160;percent loss parkwid glacial volum sinc austin post' inventori 1971.[59] np state last 150&#160;year sinc end littl ice age, period sever centuri earth experienc cool phase, glacial ice volum north cascad reduc 40&#160;percent.[59] loss glacial ice contribut decreas melt summer thunder creek watersh alone, decreas runoff amount loss 30&#160;percent summer streamflow.[53] boston glacier, north slope boston peak, largest glacier park, measur 1971 area 1,730 acr (7.0&#160;km2).[42] larg glacier includ east nooksack sulphid glacier mount shuksan, mcallist inspir glacier eldorado peak, redoubt glacier mount redoubt, neve glacier snowfield peak, challeng glacier mount challenger. ecology[edit] thornton lake fill glacier-carv basin near mount triumph main article: ecolog north cascad variat rock soil types, exposure, slope, elevation, rainfal reflect divers plant life. eight distinct life zone support thousand differ plant speci north cascad greater ecosystem. flora[edit] nation park surpass north cascad nation park' 1,630 vascular plant speci recorded. estim non-vascular fungal speci could doubl number plant speci north cascades.[60] park contain estim 236,000 acr (960&#160;km2) old-growth forests.[61] biodivers area threaten global climat chang invas exot plant species.[60] exot plant thrive use man-mad structur road trails.[60] invas plant includ diffus knapwe (centaurea diffusa) reed canari grass (phalari arundinacea).[62] fauna[edit] park also divers anim species, includ bald eagles, golden eagles, gray wolves, coyotes, bobcats, canadian lynxes, cougars, moose, elk, river otters, hoari marmots, pika, wolverines, mountain goats, grizzli bears, black bears.[63] park home 75 speci mammal 200 speci bird either pass use north cascad breed area. also 11 speci fish west side cascades.[63] exampl amphibian speci occur park includ western toad (bufo boreas) rough-skin newt (taricha granulosa).[64] fire[edit] climate[edit] air water quality[edit] recreation[edit] mountaineering[edit] camp hiking[edit] tourism[edit] attractions[edit] nearli nation park protect stephen mather wilderness, maintain build road within north south unit park. park popular backpack mountain climbers. one popular destin park cascad pass, use travel rout nativ americans. access four-mil (6&#160;km) trail end gravel road. north south picket ranges, mount triumph, well eldorado peak surround mountains, popular climber due glaciat technic rock. mount shuksan, northwest corner park, one photograph mountain countri second highest peak park 9,127&#160;ft 2,782&#160;m. access[edit] although coupl gravel road open public enter park (cascad river road begin marblemount hwi #20 upper stehekin valley road access stehekin via tour-boat chelan), automobil traffic region travel north cascad highway (washington state rout 20), pass ross lake nation recreat area. nearest larg town west side park sedro-woolley, washington, winthrop lie east. chelan locat southeastern end lake chelan east-sid access ncnp stehekin serv eastern washington communities. see also[edit] "inventori glacier north cascades, washington". u.s. geolog survey. retriev octob 11, 2014.&#160; ^ b tabor, rowland; ralph haugerud (may 14, 1999). geolog north cascades: mountain mosaic. mountain books. pp.&#160;7–8. isbn&#160;978-0898866230. retriev octob 11, 2014.&#160; ^ "geolog formations". nation park service. retriev octob 11, 2014.&#160; ^ b "north cascad student guide" (pdf). nation park service. retriev januari 31, 2015.&#160; ^ smoot, jeff (januari 1, 2002). climb washington' mountains. falcomguides. p.&#160;89. isbn&#160;978-0762710867.&#160; ^ smoot, jeff (januari 1, 2002). climb washington' mountains. falconguides. p.&#160;86. isbn&#160;978-0762710867.&#160; ^ smoot, jeff (januari 1, 2002). climb washington' mountains. falcomguides. pp.&#160;93–97. isbn&#160;978-0762710867.&#160; ^ beckey, fred (januari 15, 2003). cascad alpin guide: climb high routes: steven pass raini pass. mountain books. p.&#160;331. isbn&#160;978-0898868388.&#160; ^ "eldorado peak". geograph name inform system. unit state geolog survey.&#160; ^ "forbidden peak". geograph name inform system. unit state geolog survey.&#160; ^ b beckey, fred (jun 1, 2008). cascad alpin guide; raini pass fraser river. mountain books. pp.&#160;96–100. isbn&#160;9781594854309.&#160; ^ goldman, peggi (march 30, 2004). washington' highest mountains: basic alpin glacier routes. wilder press. pp.&#160;43–49. isbn&#160;978-0899972909.&#160; ^ "river streams". nation park service. retriev februari 4, 2015.&#160; ^ "lake ponds". nation park service. retriev februari 7, 2015.&#160; ^ b riedel, jon; mike larrabee; sharon brady; niki bowerman; rob burrows; steve dorsch; joani lawrence; jeanni wenger.
